description: Ryan Lynch is supposed to be studying for an exam, but he just can't seem to stay focused. Amid his studies, he needs to look something up on his phone, but his mind immediately wanders and before he knows it, he instinctively surfs for porn. Kristain James is skeptical of Ryan's insistence to be alone for ?educational? purposes, and suspects that there are ulterior motives, so when he burst through the door and finds Ryan with his dick out, he takes the opportunity to invade his privacy, with hopes that Ryan will invade something else...his ass! Enjoy!
title: MAKING THE GRADE
